document.docAuthor: Li, Wenliang, Chen, Xulong & Yang, Ding
document.docTitle: Noeetomima hongshanensis Li & Chen & Yang 2020, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Five new species of the genus Noeetomima Enderlein (Diptera: Lauxaniidae) from China, with a key to world species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Five new species of the genus Noeetomima Enderlein (Diptera: Lauxaniidae) from China, with a key to world species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: College of Forestry, Henan University of Science and Technology, Luoyang 471023, China. & laughonce @ 126. com, wenliangli @ haust. edu. cn, https: // orcid. org / 0000 - 0001 - 9019 - 1223

subSubSection.paragraph: Diagnosis. Palpus yellow except pale brown at tip. Mesoscutum: presutural dorsocentral seta before horizontal level of presutural acrostichal setulae. Scutellum shiny blackish brown, with grayish white pruinosity on basal 1/4. Fore femur with 5 strong posterior ventral setae and hind femur with 2 strong anterior ventral setae. Wing with 9 white radiating stripes along margin between tips of R 2+3 and CuA 1, irregular hyaline spots of different sizes in brown central area. Surstylus consisting of 1 anterior process and 1 posteroapical process in lateral view.
Description. MALE. Body length 3.2–4.0 mm, wing length 4.2–5.3 mm . FEMALE. Body length 3.0 mm, wing length 5.1 mm .

Thorax ( Fig. 4 ) brown, with grayish yellow pruinosity. Mesoscutum with pair of narrow brown median stripes extending from anterior margin to presutural acrostichal setulae, posterior margin of postpronotum surrounded by brown line, 3–4 brown spots scattered between dorsocentral and supraalar setal rows, pair of small black triangular posterior marginal spots extending to scutellum; 1+3 dorsocentral setae, anteriormost post-sutural dorsocentral seta near transverse scutal suture, presutural dorsocentral seta before horizontal level of presutural acrostichal setulae; 1+2 acrostichal setulae (not including prescutellar seta) and in 2 rows, 1st post-sutural acrostichal setulae on transverse scutal suture; prescutellar seta shorter than anteriormost postsutural dorsocentral seta; dorsocentral seta, acrostichal setulae and prescutellar seta each with 1 brown basal spots. Anepisternum and katepisternum brown with grayish pruinosity; anepisternum with 2 brown spots on upper margin and 1 brown spot on lower margin, 2 anepisternal setae (posterior anepisternal seta strong) and 3–4 short setulae; 2 katepisternal setae. Scutellum shiny blackish brown, with grayish white pruinosity on basal 1/4. Legs yellow, femur brown and only yellow at tip, apical tarsomeres brown; femur with brown subapical spot on inner side corresponding to subbasal ring on tibia. Fore femur with 5 strong posterior ventral setae and 6 posterior dorsal setae; fore tibia with 1 long dorsal preapical seta and 2 short apical ventral setae. Mid femur with 5 anterior setae and 1 apical posterior seta; mid tibia with 1 strong dorsal preapical seta and 1 strong apical ventral seta. Hind femur with 2 strong anterior ventral setae and 1 preapi- cal anterior dorsal seta; hind tibia with 1 dorsal preapical seta and 1 short apical ventral seta. Wing ( Fig. 2 ) brown, with 9 white radiating stripes along margin between tips of R 2+3 and CuA 1 ; irregular hyaline spots of different sizes in brown central area; costa with 2nd (between R 1 and R 2+3 ), 3rd (between R 2+3 and R 4+5 ) and 4th (between R 4+5 and M 1 ) sections in proportion of 3.5: 1.3: 1; r-m beyond middle of discal cell; ultimate and penultimate sections of M
1 in
proportion of 1.8: 1; ultimate section of CuA 1 about 1/6 of penultimate. Halter brown, stem yellow.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 1–5.
Noeetomima hongshanensis
sp. nov.
Male. 1. head, anterior view; 2. wing; 3. habitus, lateral view; 4. thorax, dorsal view; 5. abdomen, dorsal view.

FIGURES 6–10.
Noeetomima hongshanensis
sp. nov.
Male. 6. syntergosternite and epandrium, lateral view; 7. epandrial complex, posterior view; 8. syntergosternite, anterior view; 9. aedeagal complex, ventral view; 10. aedeagal complex, lateral view. Scale 0.5 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material. Holotype ( CAUC ): 1 ♂ , CHINA ,
Yunnan Province
: Xiaozhongdian Hongshan forestry farm, 2012. VI. 11 , Zehui Kang. Paratypes ( CAUC ): 1♂ , 1♀ , CHINA ,
Sichuan Province
: Emeishan Leidongping,
2010. VI . 27
, Tao Li. Distribution. China ( Yunnan , Sichuan ) Remarks. The new species is very similar to
Noeetomima thaiensis Sasakawa
from Thailand , but
N. hongshanensis
can be separated from the latter by the fore femur having 5 posterior ventral setae and the hind femur having 2 anterior ventral setae. Etymology. The specific epithet is named for the holotype locality Hongshan.
